live_updates: The issue has been resolved. Thanks for your patience.

29622.summary: Some customers in Vancouver (South main, north of Queen Elizabeth park) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29622.title: Nov 25 - Vancouver (South main, north of Queen Elizabeth park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: This has been resolved, thank you for your patience.
Technicians have restored services to most of the area and continue to work to resolve this issue.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
29599.summary: Some customers in the Michener Hill & Grandview areas of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29599.title: Nov 25 – Red Deer (Michener Hill & Grandview) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
